titles.title: A resolution withholding the pay of Senators if a Government shutdown occurs.
A resolution withholding the pay of Senators if a Government shutdown occurs.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.
Committee on Rules and Administration. Reported by Senator McConnell without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 296.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
